game.title: The Lost City
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, a young apprentice named Eira embarks on a quest to restore the ancient art of magic and save her kingdom from destruction.
game.beginning: Eira lives in a small village on the outskirts of the kingdom, where she learns the basics of magic from a mysterious old man. However, when the king's advisor announces that magic has disappeared, Eira is forced to flee the village as it is destroyed by dark forces.
game.ending: With her newfound powers and determination, Eira discovers an ancient city hidden deep in the jungle where she finds the source of magic: a powerful artifact known as the "Heartstone". With its power, Eira defeats the true enemy behind the disappearance of magic and restores the balance to the world.
